title: Ambergris
overview: It is the year 2053, all of humanity now enjoy the fruits of the advances in science and technology. However, there is â€˜one thing' the human race yet fails to resolve, and this problem has driven all society into a state of gloom and despair. A girl reminiscent of her childhood, a newscaster longing escape from his mundane life and the Artificial Intelligence that accompanies them set out on a journey. Why have they struggled to the edge of land? What has drawn them to sea?
